title: How to Tell if a Cancer Boy Likes You

steps.title: If he can’t take his eyes off you, this is a good sign he likes you.
steps.content: If he can’t take his eyes off you, this is a good sign he likes you. Cancer boys are often a bit shy, reserved, and even mysterious at first. [1] X Research source He may not feel comfortable coming up to you or fessing up to his feelings, but he might send a signal by gazing at you from across the room, instead. If you catch him sneaking glances at you, this may be his subtle way of communicating his interest. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Compliments are one of a Cancer boy’s top flirting tools.
steps.content: Compliments are one of a Cancer boy’s top flirting tools. Cancers are very observant, so he’s bound to pick up on all of the amazing little things about you, from your physical beauty to your sparkling personality. And, since Cancers love to make others feel good, he’ll likely tell you just how much he admires all of these things. [3] X Research source Giving you these compliments is another way for him to express his feelings and hint that he likes you, without coming out and saying it directly.

steps.title: A Cancer boy with a crush will go out of his way to take care of you.
steps.content: A Cancer boy with a crush will go out of his way to take care of you. Cancers love to be helpful and nurturing toward others, so he’ll likely do whatever he can to make things easier for you. [4] X Research source He may do things like carry your books, help you study, or bring you a coffee from your favorite coffee shop if he knows you’re having a hard day. He’ll also follow through on commitments and promises, no matter how difficult or inconvenient it is for him. If you like this Cancer boy back, Garbis recommends leaning into this dynamic. “Let him take care of you. Go to him and ask for his help if you are sick or injured, or just ask for help in general. Cancers love to emotionally support others,” she says. [5] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022.

steps.title: Introverted Cancer boys will come out of their shell to crack you up.
steps.content: Introverted Cancer boys will come out of their shell to crack you up. Since Cancers are usually shy and reserved around others, you can take it as a pretty good sign if he tries to be goofy around you or cracks a few jokes just to get you to laugh. [6] X Research source These things take a lot of courage for a Cancer, so they could be a sign that he is going out of his way to impress you!

steps.title: Touch is important to Cancers, but they withhold if they’re anxious.
steps.content: Touch is important to Cancers, but they withhold if they’re anxious. If he does intentional things like brush your hand or pull a piece of fuzz off your sweater, it means his feelings for you are strong enough to overcome his nerves. These types of things are very direct for a shy Cancer, so there’s a good chance he’s crushing on you! [7] X Research source If you like your Cancer boy back, try holding his hand or giving him a hug first. Physical touch is thought to be a Cancer’s main love language, so this could melt his heart and make him feel even closer to you.

steps.title: Cancers are super affectionate, and they can even be a bit clingy.
steps.content: Cancers are super affectionate, and they can even be a bit clingy. They value safety, security, and emotional connection, so they love spending quality time with others in order to build these things. If it seems like he goes out of his way to spend as much time with you as possible, this is a pretty clear sign that he likes you. [8] X Research source If you’re really trying to win a Cancer boy over and date him, Garbis suggests being patient with his need to be close to you. “Allow him to smother you a little bit. He is going to want to be close and to be helpful, and you should give him opportunities to be close to you,” she says. [9] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022.

steps.title: As a Cancer man’s feelings deepen, he’ll start to be more vulnerable.
steps.content: As a Cancer man’s feelings deepen, he’ll start to be more vulnerable. If he shares his feelings about something with you or asks for your help with a problem, this is a big deal. Cancers take a long time to build trust with someone, so if he’s opening up to you, it shows that he feels comfortable and close to you. [10] X Research source

steps.title: He’ll ask you about your passions, dreams, and favorite memories.
steps.content: He’ll ask you about your passions, dreams, and favorite memories. As a sensitive water sign, Cancers are all about deep emotional connection. When a Cancer man has a crush on you, he’ll want to have long, meaningful conversations, and he’ll ask you deep, personal questions to get to know you better. [11] X Research source This is his way of flirting, and it’s a surefire sign that he’s into you! Cancers are sincere people. He’s not just trying to get you to like him—he’s truly interested in what makes you tick.

steps.title: When a Cancer man likes someone, he’s deeply in tune with their needs.
steps.content: When a Cancer man likes someone, he’s deeply in tune with their needs. Ruled by the moon, the planet of emotions in astrology, Cancers are known for being incredibly intuitive, especially when they’re in love. [12] X Research source If it seems like he’s able to tell exactly what you’re thinking or feeling without you having to say anything, there’s a good chance that the two of you share a very special connection.

steps.title: Cancer boys are usually well-mannered and a little old-fashioned.
steps.content: Cancer boys are usually well-mannered and a little old-fashioned. They tend to be hopeless romantics, so don’t be surprised if it feels like you’re living in a rom-com during the early days of your courtship. [13] X Research source He might do charming things like bring you flowers or hold the door open for you. He’ll likely also be slow to initiate physical contact (like hand holding or kissing), since he might worry that he'll offend you by being too forward.

steps.title: Cancers are fiercely loyal and protective of the ones they love.
steps.content: Cancers are fiercely loyal and protective of the ones they love. His protective signs might be subtle at first, like the classic “text me when you get home” message. He might also do things like offer to walk you places, or stand up for you in public if someone is criticizing you. All of these protective behaviors are good signs that he likes you. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Watch him when another boy talks to you in front of him.
steps.content: Watch him when another boy talks to you in front of him. He’ll probably make a visibly sour or moody face or shift his posture to be more assertive. Cancer guys have a tendency to get possessive over the ones they like, even if they’re having a harmless conversation with a friend or a classmate. The notorious jealousy of Cancers can be a bit frustrating at times, but its also a surefire way to figure out if a Cancer’s got a crush on you. [15] X Research source If you start talking to another guy, your Cancer will probably walk up or find a way to steal your attention from his competitor. A jealous Cancer might also say things like, “What’s that guy’s deal?” or “He seems sketchy."

steps.title: Cancers can be pretty moody and emotional.
steps.content: Cancers can be pretty moody and emotional. They’re ruled by the moon, which is ever-changing and going through different phases, so their disposition can change at the drop of a hat. [16] X Research source They’re especially sensitive if they feel rejected by someone they have a crush on, so if he’s super sulky all of a sudden after you say you can’t hang out, or he gets defensive when you ask him to give you space, chances are he’s got feelings for you. A Cancer might experience a wide range of emotions on any given day, so try not to take his mood swings personally, and don’t be alarmed if he seems “off” for no reason. “ Give him space when he needs it, and know that he will come back around in a couple of days a new man,” says Garbis. [17] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022.

steps.title: Like all water signs, Cancers are known for being creative.
steps.content: Like all water signs, Cancers are known for being creative. So, if the Cancer man in your life has feelings for you, he may try to express them through art. Whether he makes a sketch of you, writes a poem about your relationship, or composes a piece of music about how you make him feel, you can take it as a sign that his emotions run deep. [18] X Research source

steps.title: Cancer boys are sentimental and family-oriented.
steps.content: Cancer boys are sentimental and family-oriented. He chooses his friends carefully and is in his element when he’s at home, enjoying the company of his loved ones. If he brings you around to a family event or asks you to join him and the guys for a beach day, this is a very good sign! It means that he trusts you enough to invite you into his safe spaces, which indicates that he sees a possible future with you. [19] X Research source Cancers have strong family values. If he likes you, he’ll want you to fit in and feel comfortable around his relatives and friends. Before you meet his parents for the first time, ask him if there is anything you need to be aware of, and plan to look your best and be as polite as possible. Remember, first impressions are lasting impressions! Keegan recommends playing a game or doing a fun activity with your partner’s family to help you connect with each other more organically. [20] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 June 2021. For example, joining them for a fun occasion like a family game night might be a bit less stressful than something like a formal family dinner for a first meeting.

steps.title: Cancers are all about stability and security.
steps.content: Cancers are all about stability and security. They tend to look for serious connections rather than casual flings, and their ultimate goal is to have a happy family life with their future partner. So, if the Cancer man in your life mentions you when he paints a picture of the kind of future he wants, this is a very big deal. It means that he truly sees potential in your connection, and he wants to build something lasting with you. [21] X Research source
